statements: SELECT influencer_name, payment_amount FROM influencer_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM influencer_payments WHERE budget_category = 'Fashion';
SELECT influencer_name, payment_date FROM influencer_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payment FROM influencer_payments GROUP BY influencer_name;
SELECT influencer_name, payment_amount FROM influencer_payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT influencer_name, payment_amount FROM influencer_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_payments WHERE budget_category = 'Fashion' AND payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT influencer_name, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payment FROM influencer_payments GROUP BY influencer_name;
SELECT id, influencer_name, payment_amount, MONTH(payment_date) AS payment_month FROM influencer_payments WHERE budget_category = 'Beauty' ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT influencer_name) AS total_influencers, AVG(payment_amount) AS avg_payment FROM influencer_payments WHERE budget_category = 'Fitness';
SELECT * FROM Influencers
SELECT influencer_name, payment_amount FROM Influencers
SELECT influencer_name, payment_amount FROM Influencers ORDER BY payment_amount DESC
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, payment_date FROM Influencers WHERE payment_amount > 1000
SELECT budget_name, allocated_amount FROM Budgets
SELECT influencer_name, payment_amount FROM Influencers WHERE payment_amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, payment_date FROM Influencers WHERE payment_amount >= 500 AND payment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM Influencers GROUP BY influencer_name HAVING total_payments > 1000 ORDER BY total_payments DESC;

SELECT influencer_name, payment_amount, budget_name FROM Influencers JOIN Budgets ON payment_amount <= allocated_amount WHERE remaining_amount >= 1000 ORDER BY payment_amount ASC, remaining_amount DESC;

SELECT influencer_name, payment_amount, remaining_amount FROM Influencers JOIN Budgets ON payment_amount <= allocated_amount WHERE budget_name LIKE 'Marketing%' ORDER BY remaining_amount ASC, payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_payments;
SELECT influencer_id, payment_amount FROM influencer_payments WHERE payment_date = '2022-10-30';
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payment FROM influencer_payments GROUP BY influencer_id;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, influencer_email FROM influencer_details ORDER BY influencer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_budgets WHERE budget_start_date >= '2022-11-01';
SELECT * FROM influencer_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_email FROM influencer_details WHERE influencer_social_media = 'Instagram';
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM influencer_payments GROUP BY influencer_id;
SELECT * FROM influencer_budgets WHERE budget_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND budget_end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT influencer_name, payment_amount FROM influencer_details JOIN influencer_payments ON influencer_details.influencer_id = influencer_payments.influencer_id ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM Influencers ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT influencer_name, payment_amount FROM Influencers JOIN Payments ON Influencers.influencer_id = Payments.influencer_id WHERE Payments.payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM Influencers
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY budget DESC
SELECT influencer_name, payment_amount FROM Influencers INNER JOIN Payments ON Influencers.influencer_id = Payments.influencer_id
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000
SELECT campaign_name, (budget - (SELECT SUM(amount) FROM Expenses)) AS remaining_budget FROM Campaigns
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_email FROM Influencers WHERE influencer_category = 'Fashion';
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, influencer_phone FROM Influencers WHERE influencer_category = 'Travel' ORDER BY influencer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_budget FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE influencer_category = 'Fashion';
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_email FROM Influencers ORDER BY influencer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 AND payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_budget < 5000 ORDER BY campaign_end_date ASC;

SELECT influencer_name, influencer_phone, COUNT(payment_id) AS num_payments FROM Influencers JOIN Payments ON Influencers.influencer_id = Payments.influencer_id GROUP BY influencer_name HAVING num_payments > 3;
